cluster_relations.rel_desc: Ancient Egyptian burial practices were deliberately designed to secure safe passage into the afterlife envisioned in Egyptian afterlife beliefs.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: The subject ritual, practice, or process is intentionally performed in order to achieve or support the outcome or goal represented by the object.
cluster_relations.subject_class_group: Ancient Egyptian Funerary Religion and Culture
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Ancient Egyptian Afterlife Beliefs and Concepts
cluster_relations.object_class_group: Ancient Egyptian Funerary Religion and Culture

qualifiers.SpatialQualifier: from the tomb to the afterlife
qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: when performed correctly according to custom
qualifiers.ConditionExpression: if burial practices are properly carried out
qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Outcome: safe passage into the afterlife

remarks: This complements the earlier informed_by relation by emphasizing teleological purpose.

args.canonical_rel_desc: The subject ritual, practice, or process is intentionally performed in order to achieve or support the outcome or goal represented by the object.
args.justification: All three relations link funerary rituals or practices (burial practices, mummification) to their intended goal (safe passage / afterlife outcome). They already share the same canonical predicate 'has_purpose'; refining rel_cls from the generic 'purpose_relation' to 'ritual_purpose_relation' better captures that this is a specific family of teleological links for ritual or practice purposes, while keeping the broad group as USAGE.

executed_decisions.canonical_rel_desc: The subject ritual, practice, or process is intentionally performed in order to achieve or support the outcome or goal represented by the object.
executed_decisions.justification: All three relations link funerary rituals or practices (burial practices, mummification) to their intended goal (safe passage / afterlife outcome). They already share the same canonical predicate 'has_purpose'; refining rel_cls from the generic 'purpose_relation' to 'ritual_purpose_relation' better captures that this is a specific family of teleological links for ritual or practice purposes, while keeping the broad group as USAGE.
